name: 彭祖乙
objective:
電腦稽核已廣泛的應用在金融交易，企業財務與進銷存流程與資訊系統的各項領域來協助找出瑕疵，降低與防範風險，並能做趨勢預測。本課程的目的將機器學習與人工智慧的技術應用在電腦稽核領域，主題包含：電腦稽核的流程，大量資料的整理與萃取，監督式與非監督式學習在稽核的應用，資料視覺化技術等。
Computer auditing has been widely used in financial transactions, enterprise business processes, and information systems, which is to help find flaws and reduce risks, and be able to predict trends. The purpose of this course is to apply machine learning technology in the field of computer auditing. Topics include Computer auditing related processes, the extraction and manipulation of large-scaled data, supervised and unsupervised learning in auditing applications, data visualization technology.
schedule:
week 1:     Introduction, an overview of  why, what, and how
week 2-3   Workflow of computer auditing: various cases
                 studies 
week 4-6   Data fetch and manipulation technologies:
                  hands-on with google tools and low-code RPA tools
week  7-8  Machine learning tools on dataset training and detection
week 9     Mid-term report
week 10-11 Unsupervised learning tools for auditing 
week  12-15 Data visualization 
week   16-18  Group project presentation
scorePolicy:
• Homework, class participation: 30%
• Midterm report & presentation: 30%
• Final project: 40%
